instructions.notes:
Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall with relaxed shoulders at an easy, conversational pace.

Action: Take smooth, steady strides or pedal strokes for two minutes.

Watch for: rushing early or shrugging up; Fix: shorten stride and lower resistance until breathing stays calm.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall with soft knees, ribs stacked, and a light band at chest height.

Action: Move through controlled circles, then slow pull-aparts with equal tempo.

Watch for: arching your low back or forcing range; Fix: use a lighter band and smaller circles.

items.name: Light warm-up sets for the first two lifts

instructions.notes:
Coach tip:

Position: Set up exactly like your working lifts using a light load.

Action: Complete one to two controlled rehearsal sets for each first lift.

Watch for: rushing or bouncing reps; Fix: slow tempo and add another light set before work sets.

Coach tip:

Position: Lie with feet planted, shoulder blades tucked, and wrists stacked over elbows.

Action: Press the dumbbells up smoothly while maintaining full-body tension.

Watch for: flared elbows or loose shoulders; Fix: tuck elbows slightly and reset your upper back.

Coach tip:

Position: Set hands under shoulders with body in a straight line.

Action: Lower with control, then press to full lockout.

Watch for: hips sagging or elbows flaring; Fix: brace core and keep elbows about 45 degrees.

Coach tip:

Position: Lie back with shoulder blades set and a soft elbow bend.

Action: Open arms to stretch, then squeeze back together over chest.

Watch for: dropping too deep or bending elbows more; Fix: shorten range and keep arc consistent.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall with ribs down, glutes tight, and dumbbells at shoulder height.

Action: Press straight overhead in a smooth line while staying braced.

Watch for: leaning back to finish reps; Fix: lighten load and keep ribs stacked over hips.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall with one dumbbell in front of shoulder, palm facing you.

Action: Rotate and press overhead smoothly while staying braced.

Watch for: twisting torso to assist; Fix: squeeze glutes and keep ribs facing forward.

Coach tip:

Position: Half-kneel with front foot flat and glute squeezed on down knee side.

Action: Press overhead while keeping torso stacked and stable.

Watch for: arching low back for range; Fix: tighten core and press slightly forward, not behind.

Coach tip:

Position: Set your upper back on the bench with feet grounded and wrists stacked.

Action: Press upward smoothly, keeping shoulders packed throughout each rep.

Watch for: shoulders rolling forward at the top; Fix: pause, reset shoulder blades, then continue.

Coach tip:

Position: Set upper back on incline bench with soft, fixed elbows.

Action: Lower in a wide arc, then squeeze chest to return.

Watch for: turning fly into a press; Fix: keep elbow angle constant throughout the motion.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand split-stance with cables low and chest lifted.

Action: Arc hands upward and inward until they meet at chest height.

Watch for: shrugging shoulders during squeeze; Fix: keep shoulders down and reduce load.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall with elbows pinned by your sides and shoulders relaxed.

Action: Drive the handle down by straightening your elbows under control.

Watch for: elbows drifting forward or torso swinging; Fix: lower weight and keep upper arms still.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall with elbows pointing forward and core braced.

Action: Extend elbows overhead fully, then lower under control.

Watch for: elbows flaring wide; Fix: narrow grip and keep upper arms close to ears.

Coach tip:

Position: Place hands just inside shoulder width with body rigid.

Action: Lower slowly and press up while keeping elbows close.

Watch for: hips sagging or partial range; Fix: regress angle and complete full controlled reps.

Coach tip:

Position: Start in a straight-line plank with forearms under shoulders and glutes engaged.

Action: Brace hard and hold a steady, controlled position.

Watch for: hips sagging or piking up; Fix: squeeze glutes and bring ribs toward pelvis.

Coach tip:

Position: Start in a strong high plank with shoulders over wrists.

Action: Drive knees forward one at a time at controlled tempo.

Watch for: hips bouncing high; Fix: slow cadence and keep torso level as legs switch.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall, then walk hands forward into a braced plank.

Action: Move out and back slowly while maintaining a straight body line.

Watch for: collapsing lower back in plank; Fix: squeeze glutes and shorten walkout distance.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand in a doorway with forearm supported and chest lifted.

Action: Step forward gently until a mild chest stretch is felt, then hold.

Watch for: forcing a deep stretch or shrugging; Fix: reduce range and keep shoulder away from ear.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall and bring one arm across your chest with support above the elbow.

Action: Gently draw the arm in until you feel a light stretch.

Watch for: twisting your torso to cheat range; Fix: stay square and lower the arm slightly.

Coach tip:

Position: Lie on your back or sit tall with ribs relaxed and jaw loose.

Action: Inhale through the nose and exhale longer to downshift your system.

Watch for: shallow chest-only breathing; Fix: fill belly and side ribs before each long exhale.

Coach tip:

Position: Sit or stand tall with shoulders down and a light, easy pace.

Action: Use smooth, even strokes or steps for two minutes.

Watch for: spiking intensity too soon; Fix: lower resistance and keep a talkable cadence.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall with soft knees and a light band at chest height.

Action: Perform controlled pull-aparts and smooth arm circles in both directions.

Watch for: snapping the band or arching back; Fix: slow down and reduce range until controlled.

items.name: Light warm-up sets for the first two lifts

instructions.notes:
Coach tip:

Position: Match your exact setup and grip from the upcoming pulling lifts.

Action: Perform one to two light technique sets before working weight.

Watch for: skipping prep when stiff; Fix: add a rehearsal set until movement feels smooth.

Coach tip:

Position: Sit tall with chest up, shoulders down, and neutral spine.

Action: Row elbows toward your hips, then return with control.

Watch for: rounding lower back or jerking the handle; Fix: reduce load and pause each rep.

Coach tip:

Position: Hinge forward with one hand supported and spine neutral.

Action: Row elbow toward hip, then lower with control.

Watch for: rotating torso to lift heavier; Fix: square shoulders and reduce weight.

Coach tip:

Position: Hinge at hips with chest over thighs and core tight.

Action: Pull elbows back toward hips, then control the descent.

Watch for: standing up during reps; Fix: keep hinge angle fixed throughout each set.

Coach tip:

Position: Sit tall with thighs secured and shoulders set down before pulling.

Action: Pull the bar toward your upper chest, then control the return.

Watch for: shrugging into ears or leaning back; Fix: lighten load and keep torso mostly upright.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall at cable with straight arms and shoulders set down.

Action: Drive bar toward thighs using lats, then return slowly.

Watch for: bending elbows into a row; Fix: keep arms long and move from shoulders.

Coach tip:

Position: Hinge slightly with long arms and ribs stacked.

Action: Sweep bar to thighs in a smooth arc, then return controlled.

Watch for: using lower-back extension; Fix: brace core and keep torso still.

instructions.targets: back, biceps, rear delts, upper back
instructions.notes:
Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall with cable at face height and a braced core.

Action: Pull toward your eyes while rotating thumbs back and squeezing shoulder blades.

Watch for: using momentum with low elbows; Fix: slow tempo and keep elbows high throughout.

Coach tip:

Position: Hinge with neutral spine and slight bend in elbows.

Action: Raise arms out and back, squeezing shoulder blades together.

Watch for: shrugging or swinging weights; Fix: lower load and pause at top.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall with dumbbells by sides and soft elbows.

Action: Lift arms to shoulder height, then lower with control.

Watch for: swinging through momentum; Fix: reduce load and start each rep from dead stop.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall with elbows close to your sides and shoulders quiet.

Action: Curl the weight up without swinging, then lower slowly.

Watch for: rocking your torso to finish reps; Fix: drop weight and keep upper arms fixed.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall holding neutral-grip dumbbells at your sides.

Action: Curl straight up without torso movement, then lower slowly.

Watch for: elbows drifting forward; Fix: pin upper arms and lighten weight if needed.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand upright at cable with elbows tucked and shoulders relaxed.

Action: Curl handle up smoothly and control the eccentric down.

Watch for: leaning back to finish reps; Fix: step forward and brace core harder.

Coach tip:

Position: Lie on your back with ribs down and low back gently anchored.

Action: Extend opposite arm and leg slowly while keeping your core braced.

Watch for: back arching off the floor; Fix: shorten range and exhale as limb extends.

Coach tip:

Position: Set quadruped position with hands under shoulders and knees under hips.

Action: Extend opposite arm and leg while keeping hips level.

Watch for: arching back or rotating hips; Fix: shorten reach and brace before moving.

Coach tip:

Position: Lie on back with ribs down and low back pressed gently down.

Action: Lift shoulders and legs into a tight hollow hold.

Watch for: low back lifting off floor; Fix: bend knees or raise arms less overhead.

Coach tip:

Position: Hold support with both hands, then hinge hips back with a long spine.

Action: Sink chest down until a gentle side-back stretch is felt.

Watch for: rib flare or torso twist; Fix: keep ribs stacked and reduce reach distance.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand or sit tall and clasp hands in front at shoulder height.

Action: Reach forward to spread shoulder blades while keeping neck relaxed.

Watch for: shrugging or chin jutting forward; Fix: tuck chin slightly and keep shoulders down.

Coach tip:

Position: Sit or lie comfortably with shoulders relaxed and neck long.

Action: Take slow nasal inhales and longer controlled exhales.

Watch for: holding your breath between reps; Fix: keep breath continuous and soften each exhale.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall with soft knees and relaxed shoulders at easy effort.

Action: Keep a steady cadence for two minutes to raise body temperature.

Watch for: starting too hard and tightening up; Fix: ease pace and lower resistance immediately.

Coach tip:

Position: Hold support with core braced and weight centered on the standing leg.

Action: Perform controlled hip circles, then smooth leg swings through comfort range.

Watch for: snapping swings or twisting pelvis; Fix: shorten range and slow each repetition.

items.name: Light warm-up sets for the first two lifts

instructions.notes:
Coach tip:

Position: Use your working stance and setup with lighter weight first.

Action: Do one to two technique-focused sets before loading heavier.

Watch for: jumping straight to work weight; Fix: add a prep set until movement feels clean.

Coach tip:

Position: Hold dumbbell at chest, brace core, and set feet at squat stance.

Action: Sit down between your heels while keeping chest tall.

Watch for: knees collapsing inward; Fix: press knees out and reduce depth until controlled.

Coach tip:

Position: Take a wide stance with toes slightly out and chest tall.

Action: Drop hips down between knees, then stand by driving feet through floor.

Watch for: knees caving in at bottom; Fix: push knees out and reduce load.

Coach tip:

Position: Rack dumbbells at shoulders with elbows high and core braced.

Action: Sit down and stand up while keeping torso upright.

Watch for: elbows dropping and chest folding; Fix: lighten weight and keep elbows lifted.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall with dumbbells close to thighs and a neutral spine.

Action: Hinge hips back, then drive through to stand tall.

Watch for: rounding back or bending knees too much; Fix: keep shins vertical and chest long.

Coach tip:

Position: Set machine so knee aligns with pivot and hips stay planted.

Action: Curl heels toward glutes, then lower slowly to full length.

Watch for: lifting hips off pad; Fix: reduce weight and keep pelvis anchored.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand on one leg with soft knee and square hips.

Action: Hinge back while reaching opposite leg long, then return tall.

Watch for: opening hips outward; Fix: keep toes down and reduce hinge depth.

Coach tip:

Position: Set rear foot behind you, front foot planted, and torso upright.

Action: Lower straight down with control through the front leg.

Watch for: front knee collapsing inward; Fix: track knee over toes and slow the descent.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall with dumbbells at sides and core engaged.

Action: Step forward, lower under control, then drive through front heel.

Watch for: short choppy steps causing knee stress; Fix: lengthen stride and stay upright.

Coach tip:

Position: Place full foot on box with torso tall and core braced.

Action: Drive through the working leg to stand, then lower slowly.

Watch for: pushing off trailing leg; Fix: lighten load and emphasize lead-leg effort.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall on forefoot with light support and ankles aligned.

Action: Rise to full plantar flexion, pause, then lower slowly to stretch.

Watch for: bouncing through reps; Fix: pause one second at top and bottom each rep.

Coach tip:

Position: Sit tall with balls of feet on platform and knees stable.

Action: Press heels up, pause, then lower to a full stretch.

Watch for: rushing partial reps; Fix: use a one-second pause at top and bottom.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall on one foot with support as needed.

Action: Rise fully onto toes, then lower slowly below level.

Watch for: ankle rolling inward or outward; Fix: keep pressure through middle toes.

Coach tip:

Position: Stack shoulders and hips with elbow directly under your shoulder.

Action: Lift hips and hold a straight line from head to heels.

Watch for: hips dropping or rotating; Fix: squeeze glutes and shorten hold to keep alignment.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand sideways to cable with knees soft and core tight.

Action: Press hands straight out and hold, resisting rotation.

Watch for: torso turning toward cable; Fix: reduce load and keep hips square.

Coach tip:

Position: Sit tall with core braced and heels grounded or lightly elevated.

Action: Rotate torso side to side under control, moving from ribs.

Watch for: swinging arms without trunk rotation; Fix: slow down and turn shoulders each rep.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall and hinge from hips with a long, neutral spine.

Action: Ease into mild hamstring tension and hold without bouncing.

Watch for: rounding your back to go deeper; Fix: bend knees slightly and reset spine length.

Coach tip:

Position: Stand tall, hold support, and keep knees close together.

Action: Draw heel toward glute while gently tucking hips under.

Watch for: arching low back or flaring knee out; Fix: keep knee down and ribs stacked.

Coach tip:

Position: Lie on your back or sit tall with shoulders soft.

Action: Inhale through the nose, then exhale longer to lower tension.

Watch for: forcing huge breaths or breath-holding; Fix: keep rhythm smooth and comfortably paced.
